```
invalid operation: <-ch (receive from send-only type chan<- int)
```

```
invalid operation: ch <- 2 (send to receive-only type <-chan int)
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	ch := make(chan int, 3)
	process(&ch)
	fmt.Println(ch)
}

func process(ch *chan int) {
	*ch <- 2
	s := <-*ch
	*ch = nil
	fmt.Println(s)
} 
```
